name: INSTITUTE OF INTERNATIONAL BANKERS
description: Association representing internationally-headquartered financial institutions in the U.S.
sampleDescriptions: Legislation and regulation affecting internationally headquartered financial institutions operating in the U.S.

Legislation and regulation affecting internationally headquartered financial institutions operating in the U.S., including implementation of S.2155, the "Economic Growth, Regulatory Relief, and Consumer Protection Act."
Implementation of provisions of the "Tax Cut and Jobs Act of 2017" affecting foreign banking organizations.
Legislative and regulatory issues impacting the taxation of foreign banking organizations, including implementation of H.R. 1, "Tax Cut and Jobs Act of 2017".
Legislative and regulatory issues impacting foreign banking organizations, including implementation of S. 2155, "Economic Growth, Regulatory Relief, and Consumer Protection Act of 2018"

Legislative and regulatory issues impacting foreign banking organizations, including implementation of S. 2155, "Economic Growth, Regulatory Relief, and Consumer Protection Act of 2018;" and H.R.748, the "CARES Act."

Legislative and regulatory issues impacting foreign banking organizations, including implementation of S. 2155, "Economic Growth, Regulatory Relief, and Consumer Protection Act of 2018;" and H.R.748, the "Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security Act."

Legislative and regulatory issues impacting foreign banking organizations, including implementation of S. 2155, "Economic Growth, Regulatory Relief, and Consumer Protection Act of 2018;" and H.R.748, the "Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security Act."  Modernization of Bank Secrecy Act and anti-money laundering provisions.

Legislative and regulatory issues impacting foreign banking organizations, including implementation of S.2155, the "Economic Growth, Regulatory Relief, and Consumer Protection Act of 2018," and of H.R.748, the "Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security Act."
Tax provisions applicable to foreign banking organizations in the U.S., including the Base Erosion and Anti-abuse Tax.
Legislative and regulatory issues impacting foreign banking organizations, including Basel capital reforms.
Tax provisions applicable to foreign banking organizations in the U.S.
Legislative and regulatory issues impacting foreign banking organizations, including Basel capital reforms. Legislative and regulatory issues relating to digital assets.
